did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Milton Kelenson's photograph collection including some from the United Federal Workers of America conventions.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Kelenson was a union rep for Local 30, United Public Workers-CIO, and for Local 1, United Federal Workers.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of six oversize photographs.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.). Executive Board -- Photographs
United Federal Workers of America -- Photographs

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Milton Kelenson Photographs #5962 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p:
